events.message: Client reported an auto accident involving their car hitting a guardrail on the highway early in the morning.
Claim was categorised under Auto Accident after review of initial report and keywords relating to vehicle collision.
A claims agent specialized in auto accidents was assigned promptly to handle the case and support the client.
The insured party received official acknowledgement of the claim with details on next steps clearly communicated.
Request sent to client asking for photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and insurance card copy.
The client submitted all requested documentation including detailed pictures of the collision damage and report.
Investigation into the circumstances of the vehicle collision commenced, including contacting relevant authorities.
Completed investigation confirmed liability and assessed the full extent of damages sustained by the insured vehicle.
A fair settlement offer was proposed to the client based on repair estimates and policy coverage provisions.
Client responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with clear communication.
The claim was officially approved by management after all documentation and investigation results were confirmed.
Settlement payment was promptly processed and issued to the clientâ€™s bank account for vehicle repair costs.
Claim successfully closed following payment disbursement and confirmation of client's agreement on resolution.
All claim files and correspondence were archived in the system for future reference and record keeping.
